scripts.pull-reference: git clone https://github.com/tscircuit/circuit-json.git && find circuit-json/tests -name '*.test.ts' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0" "${0%.test.ts}.ts"' {} \; && git clone https://github.com/tscircuit/stepts.git && find stepts/tests -name '*.test.ts' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0" "${0%.test.ts}.ts"' {} \;
